PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Firewall Engineer
Senior Systems / Network Engineer
Security Consultant
Network / Security Admin
Network Associate

Competency.name: monitoring of all servers and network equipment
Maintenance and Troubleshooting of the network & Network devices

CompetencyEvidence.name: Alias
CompetencyEvidence.StringValue: Maintenance and Troubleshooting of the network & Network devices

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Ankit Dhawan has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. During his last employment he was working as a Sr. Firewall Engineer at Ceasers. Ankit has extensive knowledge of Cisco Switches/Routers, VPN, LAN/WAN > LAN, Cisco ASA, Router, CheckPoint Firewall, UNIX, TCP/IP, OSPF (Open Shortest Path First), LAN/WAN, IP, Cisco Pix Firewall, Microsoft Visio, EIGRP (Enhanced Interior Gateway Routing Protocol), UNIX Open BSD, NOC, Microsoft Exchange Server, LAN/WAN > WAN, LAN/WAN > VLAN, IOS, IBM OS/2, Domain Name Server Protocol, CheckPoint VPN, BGP (Border Gateway Protocol), Triple DES, Tavve, Sun Solaris, Novell Netware > Novell Netware 3.x, Nokia, Microsoft Word, Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Microsoft SQL Server 6.5, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Back Office, Microsoft Access, MD5, Linux Red Hat, Intrusion Detection System, IBM Tivoli NetView DM, HP OpenView, HP Network Node Manager, GroupWise, FDDI (Fiber Distributed Data Interface), Dynamic Host Control protocol, Compaq/Digital Hardware, CiscoWorks 2000, CiscoWorks, CiscoView, Cisco Secure VPN. So far Ankit has not gained any managerial experience.
